SEARCH
Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.io

Class ReadContext

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.io.ReadContext
public final class ReadContext extends Object
A read-only view of a ByteBuffer that hydrates object references on the fly. On object read, deserializes the data using the nearest Class-matched Serializer provider on the classpath, and stores an incrementing ID reference to the deserialized instance. Subsequent reads of this ID from the backing buffer will return that same instance. To maintain this order-reliant encounter guarantee, it is critical that a provider Serializer.write(Object, WriteContext) data in the same order that it will Serializer.read(ReadContext).

  • Constructor Details

    • ReadContext

      public ReadContext(ByteBuffer buffer, ReadableByteChannel channel)
      Constructs a new read context using buffer to read from channel.

    • ReadContext

      public ReadContext(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Constructs a new read context reading from buffer. Does not gracefully handle exhausted buffers.

    • ReadContext

      public ReadContext(ByteBuffer buffer, Consumer<? super ByteBuffer> next)
      Constructs a new read context reading from buffer. The next callback is invoked with the provided buffer once it is exhausted but a read operation requires more data, and is expected to update the buffer with new data.

  • Method Details

    • getByte

      public byte getByte()
      Returns the byte at the current position in the backing buffer and increments the position.

    • getInt

      public int getInt()

    • getString

      public String getString()
      Returns the string at the current position in the backing buffer and increments the position.

    • getObject

      public <T> T getObject(Class<T> c)
      Reads the object of type c at the current position in the backing buffer using the best matching serializer and increments the position. If the current position is a reference ID to a previously-seen object, returns that same object.
